en.today: Tap into your roots as the Cancer moon and Jupiter unite this morning, darling Aries, expanding upon the experiences that have shaped your unique perspective. Venus, Chiron, and Mars activate to emphasize the importance of acceptance, though you should avoid wearing a mask simply because other people want to see you in it. Get ahead of your work when the sun and Luna align this afternoon, increasing your efficiency. Rocky emotions surface later today while the moon, Mars, and Chiron form a harsh t-square, testing your relationships. Luckily, you'll have a chance to straighten out issues this evening once Mercury and Saturn stir. Follow through on creative visions to unwind before bed as Luna enters Leo and aspects Neptune.

en.today: Intuitive hunches lead you in many directions, dear Leo, as the Cancer moon aspects eight celestial bodies throughout the day. Embrace growth at a steady pace, and recognize if big dreams cause you to disconnect from the present. Outside opinions could generate further confusion, and it'll be essential to stay grounded in your own truth and preferences. As Venus aligns with Chiron and Mars, consider meditating or connecting with the divine to increase drive and awareness. You'll have the power to enchant and expand your reach later tonight once Luna enters your sign, forming a dreamy aspect with Neptune.

en.today: The Cancer moon heightens your intellect and amplifies the voice, dear Taurus, aspecting the nodes of fate, Jupiter, sun, Chiron, Mars, and Saturn as the hours pass. Be both outspoken and observant, choosing your words wisely when it's time to speak up. Nurture private aspirations while Venus aligns with Chiron and Mars, considering where you need more discipline and grace. If you tend to go overboard with the expectations you place upon yourself, try to appreciate what makes you stand out. Sleepy vibes carry you toward warm and restful sleep later tonight once Luna enters Leo and connects with Neptune.

en.today: You'll be asked to take responsibility for existing and future blessings, dear Gemini, as the Cancer moon moves through your solar second house. Activating eight celestial bodies as the hours pass, this lunar placement highlights how one goal feeds into the next, encouraging you to consider what is sustainable. Meanwhile, Venus, Chiron, and Mars align, urging you to think for yourself when faced with multiple opinions. Give yourself time to reset and recharge this evening, pulling away from outside noise. Escape into a dreamier world and indulge your whimsical side once Luna enters Leo and aspects Neptune later tonight.
